item.title: Why the chameleon must not be killed
item.summary: ...reasons for not killing the Chameleon, which came out of the sky (L IV.-3. p.iv.).
item.comments: 1) ≠kasin heard this story from his mother (ko a ≠ko); a note states that he means 'God' when he says 'Father'; God and his real father would both be angry if he killed a chameleon, 2) See also How an old woman asked a chameleon for rain, 3) This story is found in Book IV-3
item.author: ≠kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
